hero.headline: Discover Asia's hidden wonders
hero.subheadline: Small-group journeys crafted by local experts across Mongolia, Bhutan, Vietnam and beyond.

whyUs.title: Built with guides, not just for them
whyUs.body: We work directly with on-the-ground operators to design reliable, bookable trips that still feel one-of-a-kind. Every tenant workspace comes with tools for operations, sales and guest communication.
whyUs.guides: Expert local guides who live the places they show.
whyUs.groups: Small groups for slower travel and deeper connection.
whyUs.support: 24/7 customer and on-trip support for your guests.
whyUs.guarantee: Best price guarantee across all direct bookings.

testimonials.title: Travelers who went and never forgot
testimonials.subtitle: From desert skies to monastery courtyards, these are real trips designed and run by tenants on Tripsaas.

categories.title: Tailor the right journey for every guest
categories.subtitle: Mix and match categories to build a portfolio that fits your brand.
categories.hint: Hover a card to see what each style includes.

adventure.title: Adventure
adventure.caption: High passes, wild camps and starlit skies.
adventure.description: Trekking routes, remote camps and off-road expeditions designed for active travelers who want to earn every view.

cultural.title: Cultural
cultural.caption: Temples, tea houses and local stories.
cultural.description: Slow itineraries focused on monasteries, markets and family-run stays that bring Asia’s daily life to the forefront.

beach.title: Beach
beach.caption: Islands, coves and sunset dinners.
beach.description: Coastal escapes in Vietnam, Thailand and beyond with handpicked stays, gentle activities and flexible downtime.

wildlife.title: Wildlife
wildlife.caption: Snow leopards, wild horses and rare birds.
wildlife.description: Ethical encounters with Asia’s wildlife, built with local conservation partners and strict group-size limits.

photography.title: Photography
photography.caption: Blue-hour temples and golden steppe light.
photography.description: Guided itineraries for photographers with sunrise access, scouting days and local fixers who understand the frame.

culinary.title: Culinary
culinary.caption: Steam, spice and street-side stools.
culinary.description: Food-first journeys pairing markets, home kitchens and regional specialties with just enough walking in between.
